ygData.subject: Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard about this mailing list from my friend, so I ran over and subscribed.  I m an EQ player, and the idea of being able to talk with other like minded
ygData.messageBody:
I heard about this mailing list from my friend, so I ran over and
subscribed. I'm an EQ player, and the idea of being able to talk with other
like minded people is very exciting. I really enjoy gabbing about the game
;) I've been in EQ since phase 2 of beta. I used to play on a MUD with the
producer of the game as a matter of fact (he was in my guild haha), and he
got me into it. I've migrated about the servers since I started, moved by
packetloss problems and to follow friends. I'm fairly firmly rooted in
Tunare now, but I started on Brell Serilis tonight once I heard others were
going to be there also.

I'm playing a dwarf cleric named Loar, so if you see me on, feel free to say
hi!
